title: Executive Order 5485-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands for Resurvey
content: It is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 4638, dated April 26, 1927, withdrawing the public lands in T. 20 N., Rs. 6 and 7 E., New Mexico principal meridian, New Mexico, pending a resurvey, be, and the same is hereby, revoked.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5485-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands for Resurvey Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372978
